DOC.brief_summary: Probiotic supplementation preterm infant report beneficial neonatal intensive care unit ( NICU ) . Our pilot study also show accelerated feeding preterm infant receive Bifidobacterium bifidum early birth . In order evaluate beneficial effect Bifidobacterium bifidum , prospective randomize control study conduct . The hypothesis study Bifidobacterium bifidum supplementation preterm infant improve enteral feed growth low birth weight infant .
DOC.brief_title: Bifidobacterium Supplementation Very Low Birth Weight Infants
DOC.criteria: Infants birth weight less 1500g Sever bacteremia Congenital anomaly Not suitable trial define attend neonatologist
